attributes.action: Adopt a Maximum Suppression Strategy for COVID-19 as adviced by independent SAGE
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to adopt a Maximum Suppression Strategy for COVID-19 rather than mere containment so that levels of infection are driven down and kept down at a low levels where outbreaks can be handled through highly targeted measures (notabley test, trace and supported isolation).  This will ensure the public are protected with the minimum of disruption to everday life and the economy due to an ongoing cycle of opening up and lockdowns.
attributes.background: Adopt a Maximum Suppression Strategy for COVID-19 as recommended and outlined by Independent SAGE (Group of independent scientists) in their reports 26/02/21 and 19/02/21 rather than mere containment:  https://www.independentsage.org/strategy-for-covid-19-maximum-suppression-or-mere-containment/

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to enact a Maximum Supression Strategy. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571965
